snippet: NASA has postponed the launching of a cargo ship to the International Space Station until astronauts there have solved a cooling system problem.
abstract: NASA says astronauts aboard International Space Station will venture outside on three spacewalks to replace a malfunctioning pump that has shut down part of the station’s cooling system; also postpones launching of cargo supply ship.
lead_paragraph: NASA has postponed the launching of a cargo ship to the International Space Station until astronauts there have solved a cooling system problem.

headline.main: Spacewalks Set to Fix Broken Space Station Pump
headline.print_headline: Spacewalks Set to Fix Broken Space Station Pump
